entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 25. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
